title: telisu kolumannA
sahitya:
telisu kolumannA svatantrya mannA sarigA


anupallavi

  velisenoka gAndhi kalugu sukha shAnti kalisi melisi masalu konu tE manaku nIti sarigA


caraNam 1    Edi cEsina mElO Edi cEsina kIdO Edi mancini pencunO Edi sukhamunu druncunO sarigA
    caraNam 2    sammeluna pEra pragati pathakam mulanu vammu cEyuTakA svatantrya mannA sarigA
    caraNam 3    brahma vrAsina vrAtakeduru lEdA nADu patrikala vrAta-kedurulE dI nADu sarigA
    caraNam 4    bhUmini mOyuTaminnA bhUmipe pannula bhAramu mOyuTakannA sarigA
    caraNam 5    muccaTaina muraLI gAnamu naccanivArU aruduga nunDurannA 
         mecca lEdA svaccamaina A candamAmakaina sarigA
